title: Webview Articles
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps: When the user taps a news article from the index
custom_expected: Then the article will launch in a webview

title: Loading Indicator
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article
custom_expected: THEN the user should be shown a loading indicator (progress bar) prior to the article being displayed

title: Article Title Header - News
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the header of the article
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the word "News" displayed in EN
AND the word "Noticias" in ES 
AND the article title will not be displayed in the header

title: Removal of Tab Bar when viewing articles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND taps on an article in the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the article
custom_expected: THEN the Tab Bar will not be visible to the user while viewing the article

title: Edge Swiping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user decides to go back to the previous News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user can edge gesture swipe back to the previous screen

title: Returning to News Index via Edge Swiping (Stacking Articles)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through multiple articles within the view
AND the articles stack on top of each other
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to navigate back through the stacked articles one-by-one to the News Index by Edge swiping.

title: Invalid URLs in newsreader
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on an article in the newsreader
custom_steps: WHEN there is a malformed URL or the URL is unable to load for whatever reason
custom_expected: THEN the user should see an alert or other messaging stating that there is a problem with the URL

title: "Done" Button  Functionality - Push Notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user receives a push notification that opens up a News story
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the news story 
from any  notification
custom_expected: THEN the Done button will take the user back to the default view

title: Player Card - Push Notification
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a notification for a news article that includes a player link
custom_steps:
When the user opens the notification
AND tap on the player link
custom_expected: THEN the Player card should present modally on top of the story, without dismissing the article below it

title: Player Card - X button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on a player link in the webview article
custom_expected:
THEN the player card opens in a modal on top of the article 
and it includes an "X" button to close the modal

title: Scroll Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
- Device setting is on dark mode
- the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article and scroll
custom_expected: THEN the scroll bar on articles in dark mode does not appear in black color but appears in light color

title: Loading indicator (Low connectivity)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on low connectivity environment
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on an article from the News index
custom_expected: THEN Loading indicator should appear before every article load

title: Offline/Airplane Mode and Refresh Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has low connectivity and cannot load an article
OR the user has their device in Airplane mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a stable connection
custom_expected:
THEN a refresh button will be available to tap on 
AND tapping on the refresh button will load the article again for viewing

title: Share Functionality Within Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing the webview article
AND there is a Share button available to tap on
custom_expected:
THEN the share tray will be visible
AND the user is able to share the content to their desired platform

title: Localization (Spanish ES) - News
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user's on the home feed
AND device language settings is set to ES (Spanish)
AND the user views the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the article stack
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the news index and article
custom_expected: THEN the page title, News Index content and article should load successfully in Spanish

title: Dark/Light Mode Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has their device in Light Mode
OR the user has their device in dark mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the News Index and taps on an article
custom_expected:
THEN the user's device Dark/Light mode should be respected
AND the article should be displayed based on their preferences

title: Free/Not Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user that is not logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: Free/Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user that is logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

GIVEN the user is entitled with MLBALL (via in-app purchase)

custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Team Page - Short Content

Given user is viewing a team page
and is viewing the News section of the team page
custom_steps:
When there is a short-content article 
(title usually starts with "Video Story")

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the article directly from the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the article will launch in Safari, instead of the webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps "See All" to view the whole team news index
and launches the article from the index

When the user taps the team filter at the top
and selects a new team

title: Main Page - Team filter - cold start and background restore

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user installs the app for the first time or performs a cold start of the app

WHEN the app launches
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MLB will be the default selection on the team picker and will display the MLB specific home feed content

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user selects a different team from the team picker

WHEN the user backgrounds the app and brings it back to the foreground
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected team is displayed in the team picker and it’s content is displayed on the home feed

title: Main Page - App Restoration after poor connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with device included in the adobe target test group for the home surface
AND proxying through Charles

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the app is freshly installed
AND throttling is subsequently set in Charles to 56Kbps
AND the app is opened
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the News tab shows

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the app is put in the background for 30s
AND then closed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app is dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN throttling is turned off
AND the app is restarted
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the batter logo screen appears (indicating a cold start)
AND the home tab appears at the bottom of the app

title: Main Page - App Restoration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND on iOS devices, Settings/Developer/Fast App Termination is set to on

To do: Is a similar setting needed/available on Android?
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is put in the background for >30s 
AND the app is restored to the foreground
custom_expected:
THEN the batter logo screen appears (indicating a cold start)
AND the home tab appears at the bottom of the app

title: Main Page - Apollo Environment switching - Internal builds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user running an internal or debug build
custom_steps: WHEN the environment is changed
custom_expected:
THEN the Apollo environment api endpoint will change as follows:

PROD: https://data-graph.mlb.com/graphql
QA: https://data-graph-qa.mlb.com/graphql
BETA: https://data-graph-beta.mlb.com/graphql

Standalone versions and current android version also can switch to the following:
DEV: https://data-graph-dev.mlb.com/graphql
QA: https://data-graph-qa.mlb.com/graphql
MASTER: https://data-graph-master.mlb.com/graphql (set by selecting 'staging' on iOS)

title: Game Stories - General functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home Page
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN it will have the following features:

- Vertical portrait style cards that will display the team logo and team color in a team vs team slash style
- “Game Stories” header text and logo will display above the vertical cards
- The vertical cards will be presented in a horizontal scroll
- Three/four cards will initially show with then next card in the list peaking into view

title: Game Stories - Pre-game state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in the pregame state
custom_expected: THEN the game time (first pitch) will be displayed in a badge on the card

title: Game Stories - In-progress state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in progress
custom_expected: THEN the inning will be displayed on the card

title: Game Stories - Final state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Game Stories carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a final state
custom_expected: THEN a “Final” badge will be displayed on the card

title: Game Stories - Card sort order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the Home page
AND the user has a favorite/follow team set
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories Carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN the cards will be sorted in the following order (from left to right):

1. Favorite Team
2. Followed Team(s) 
3. Chronologic game time order

title: Game Stories - Day parting
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN the Game Stories carousel is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN games will display according to the following rules:

- Before 10AM ET (utilize the scoreboard flip logic if possible) Yesterday’s Games Stories will be displayed 
- If there are no game stories yesterday, only Today will displayed
- After 10AM ET - Today’s Game Stories will be displayed

custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on a player link in the webview article
custom_expected:
THEN the player card opens in a modal on top of the article 
and it includes an "X" button to close the modal

title: Scroll Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
- Device setting is on dark mode
- the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article and scroll
custom_expected: THEN the scroll bar on articles in dark mode does not appear in black color but appears in light color

title: Loading indicator (Low connectivity)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on low connectivity environment
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on an article from the Home Tab News index
custom_expected: THEN Loading indicator should appear before every article load

title: Offline/Airplane Mode and Refresh Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has low connectivity and cannot load an article
OR the user has their device in Airplane mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a stable connection
custom_expected:
THEN a refresh button will be available to tap on 
AND tapping on the refresh button will load the article again for viewing

title: Share Functionality Within Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing the webview article
AND there is a Share button available to tap on
custom_expected:
THEN the share tray will be visible
AND the user is able to share the content to their desired platform

title: Localization (Spanish ES)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user's device language settings is set to ES (Spanish)
AND the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the news index and article
custom_expected: THEN both the News Index content and article should load successfully in Spanish

title: Dark/Light Mode Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has their device in Light Mode
OR the user has their device in dark mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the News Index and taps on an article
custom_expected:
THEN the user's device Dark/Light mode should be respected
AND the article should be displayed based on their preferences

title: Free/Not Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user that is not logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the Home Tab News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article on Home Tab
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: Free/Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user that is logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: MLBALL Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with an MLBALL
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBALL (Anonymous) Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled with MLBALL (via in-app purchase)
but has not logged in to the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBAUDIO Users - Ads

custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Single Team Users - Ads

custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Team Page - Short Content

Given user is viewing a team page
and is viewing the News section of the team page
custom_steps:
When there is a short-content article 
(title usually starts with "Video Story")

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the article directly from the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the article will launch in Safari, instead of the webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps "See All" to view the whole team news index
and launches the article from the index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the article will launch in Safari, instead of the webview

title: Team Filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team filter at the top
and selects a new team
custom_expected: Then the newly selected team's news index will load

custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Display “Most Popular” label above a carousel of videos

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel thumbnail

custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel swiping side to side

custom_expected: Side to side horizontal swiping takes you from video to video

title: Tapping on a video thumbnail

title: Carousel  Scrolls - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user scrolling the video carousel on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN each thumbnail is snapped
custom_expected:
THEN the following data will be logged to Adobe:

trackAction: MLB App : Home Feed : <clubAbbreviation> : Content Carousel : Carousel Scroll
action.element.index: <the index of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.text: <the visible text of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.sectionIndex: 0
action.element.sectionTitle: "Top Highlights"

title: Carousel Content Clicks - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home page video carousel
custom_steps: WHEN content is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN data similar to the following example will be logged to Adobe: 

trackAction:	MLB App : Home Feed : MLB : Top Highlights : Content Card Click			
action.element.index:	0			
action.element.sectionIndex:	0			
action.element.text:	Legendary managers join Reynolds			
action.element.video.slug	/legendary-mangers-join-reynolds

title: Configurable home surface basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a home feed configuration json file that contains an ordered list of modules
custom_steps: WHEN the request is complete and turned into a model
custom_expected:
THEN we start composing the UI modules
(ex. Home feed page is correctly drawn per the contents of json file)

title: Configurable home surface add modules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a home feed configuration json file that contains an ordered list of modules
AND the home feed UI is already showing content
custom_steps:
WHEN the request is complete and turned into a model
AND the config file contains 2 more modules in addition to the already existing ones
custom_expected:
THEN we recompose the UI in such a way that the pre existing UI widgets are not redrawn
(ex. a module at the top that is still at the top in the config file is not redrawn)

title: Configurable home surface reorder modules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a home feed configuration json file that contains an ordered list of modules
AND the home feed UI is already showing content
custom_steps:
WHEN the request is complete and turned into a model
AND the config file contains the exact same modules but in different order
custom_expected:
THEN we recompose the UI in such a way that the pre existing UI widgets are not redrawn 
AND the new modules are inserted in the correct position
(ex. a module at the top of the screen that is in the same position in the config file is not redrawn)

title: Surface Selecting 'MLB'  (league surface)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN access to the Contentful home surface
AND a surface has been created that matches an agreed upon slug with the client team in production
AND some populated sections have been added
custom_steps: WHEN MLB is selected
custom_expected: THEN I should see the home surface (league) show up in the app

title: Surface Localization
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a home surface has been created in Contentful
AND localized values have been added to the sections in Contentful
custom_steps: WHEN a user’s device is in that locale
custom_expected: THEN the localized values should be displayed

title: Surface Section arrangement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a home surface has been created in Contentful
AND the sections are arranged in a particular order
custom_steps: WHEN the home surface is viewed
custom_expected: THEN the sections should render in the order specified

title: Surface Unpublished changes in beta
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a surface has been created with values that are saved but unpublished for an agreed upon slug
custom_steps: WHEN a client is pointed to the Beta environment
custom_expected: THEN the saved home surface will display

title: Surface published changes in production
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a Contentful configuration had been published to production
custom_steps: WHEN the microapp is pointed to the production environment
custom_expected: THEN the published Contentful configuration is reflected in the app

title: Surface Name in Contentful
custom_preconds: GIVEN a home surface in the Contentful editor
custom_steps: WHEN a name has been added to a Surface
custom_expected:
THEN that name appears in the Contentful editor to easily identify the surface
AND the name does not affect the client in any way

title: Surface Team selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a surface has been created with agreed upon slug for the team
custom_steps: WHEN switching to a team in the app
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the configured surface
AND the behaviors should be consistent with any other surface

title: Surface Loading error handling
custom_preconds: GIVEN an attempt to load the home surface
custom_steps: WHEN the request fails or responds with an error
custom_expected:
THEN I should use a predefined surface stored in the client
AND I should log an error to Firebase

title: Section style
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a section has been created within a surface in Contentful
AND the section is populated with modules
AND a style has been set
custom_steps: WHEN the home page is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN that section should be be rendered with the style applied
(ex. CAROUSEL, HEADLINE_STACK, FEED)

title: Section header style
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a section has been created in a home surface
AND a header has been added with a title
AND the title is localized
custom_steps: WHEN the home surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN a header should appear at the top of the section with the specified title
AND the title should change to the localized entry (Spanish) when the device’s language does

title: Section name in Contentful
custom_preconds: GIVEN a home surface in the Contentful editor
custom_steps: WHEN a name has been added to a Section
custom_expected:
THEN that name appears in the Contentful editor to easily identify the surface
AND the name does not affect the client in any way

title: Section display limit basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a Display Limit has been set on a section
custom_steps: WHEN scrolling to the end of the carousel
custom_expected:
THEN they should see the same number of items as the set Display Limit 
OR less if a Limit (# items retuned from service) has been set in the module that is lower that the Display Limit
Note: then the number of items will match the module Limit, or the number of items available from the service if lower

title: Section display limit and Expand from header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a Section has been created in a home surface
AND a display limit has been set
AND a header has been added with the expand text set
AND the expand text is localized
custom_steps:
WHEN the number of loaded items in the section exceeds the display limit
AND the home surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN a button should appear that shows the expand text
AND tapping the button should expand the items in the section
AND the expand text should change to the localized entry (Spanish) when the device’s language does

title: Section display limit and Expand from Footer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a section in a home surface has been created
AND a display limit has been set
AND the number of loaded items in the section exceeds the display limit
AND a footer has been added with the expand text set
AND the expand text is localized
custom_steps: WHEN the home surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN a button should appear in the footer that shows the expand text
AND tapping the button should expand the items in the section
AND the expand text should change to the localized entry (spanish) when the device’s language does

title: Section No footer for type HEADLINE_STACK
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a footer has not been set in a section
AND the style for that section is HEADLINE_STACK
custom_steps: WHEN the home surface is viewed
custom_expected: THEN I should not see a footer in the section

title: Content Module - Only videos for style = carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an Item of Type Section and Style carousel
ex. the Top Highlights section
custom_steps: WHEN the Home Surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN only content of type videos will be included
(Articles, VSM Content, Short Content will not be supported in the carousel component at this point)

title: Content Module basic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a content module has been added to a section
AND a list with the corresponding slug has been added
AND a style has been set for that section
custom_steps: WHEN the Home Surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN entities are seen associated with that slug rendered in the section in the style specified
AND the entities associated with that slug show the localized version when switching language on the device (Spanish)

title: Content Module Recommended content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a content module with a valid list with corresponding slug
AND an experience version has been specified
AND personalized positions have been added
custom_steps: WHEN the Home Surface is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN content recommendations will be inserted in the specified slots of the module
AND the recommendations associated with that slug show the localized version when switching language on the device (Spanish)

title: Content Module Skip param
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the home surface
custom_steps: WHEN a skip is set in the Contentful module config
custom_expected:
THEN the skip value is not passed to the Midfield content queries
AND the set number of items will be skipped in the response from the service

title: Content Module Limit Param
custom_preconds: GIVEN access to Contentful

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Limit field is left blank
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the limit sent with the request for the module data will default to 25
AND the request will contain 25 or less items

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Limit is set to an integer
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the limit sent with the request for the module data will default be the value set
AND if 0<integer<25 then the number of items returned will be limited by the integer
AND if 0>=integer the number of items returned is 0
